txt.en: In the year 1981 of the Third Age, the Longbeards made their final stand against the Balrog known as 'Durin's Bane'. The brave dwarves that defied the terror on that day would be the saviors of their people, but the fate of their kingdom was certain.
You have completed The Fall of Khazad-dûm -- Tier 4.
Complete The Fall of Khazad-dûm -- Tier 4

In the year 1981 of the Third Age, the Longbeards made their final stand against the Balrog known as 'Durin's Bane'. The brave dwarves that defied the terror on that day would be the saviors of their people, but the fate of their kingdom was certain.
